records.Name: Q-0000
records.QuestionText__c: Could you please confirm your full name as it appears on your account?

records.Name: Q-0001
records.QuestionText__c: Could you please confirm your date of birth?

records.Name: Q-0002
records.QuestionText__c: Could you please confirm the address associated with your account?

records.Name: Q-0005
records.QuestionText__c: Can you tell me about a recent investment or transaction you made with us, such as the investment type and amount?

records.Name: Q-0004
records.QuestionText__c: Could you please confirm your account number?

records.Name: Q-0006
records.QuestionText__c: Could you please confirm the email address or phone number associated with your account?

records.Name: Q-0003
records.QuestionText__c: Can you please provide details of your last transaction with us, such as the date and amount?

records.Name: Q-0007
records.QuestionText__c: Could you please answer the security question: [Security question that the customer set up during account creation]?

records.Name: Q-0008
records.QuestionText__c: Can you recall any recent communication or notifications you received from us, such as the subject or content of a recent email?

records.Name: Q-0009
records.QuestionText__c: Could you please provide details on a specific investment in your portfolio, such as the name of the investment and the date you acquired it?
